#summary Transport tab overview

*Transport Functions*
  # Trader = ON / Trader = OFF
    Toggles trader on/off.
  # Show Routes
    Lists all saved routes.
*Add Trade Route*
  # From City
    The city from which to send the transport from.
  # To City
    You can select the target city or type in the coordinates in the box.
  # Time inbetween to check transport
    The amount of time difference to go through the entire list in minutes. NOT time between each transport.
  # Don't send transport out if less than X wagons
    If amount of wagons needed is less than X, then the transport will not get sent out.
  # Trade amount
    * Checkbox - If checked, the resource will be transported out. If not, then the resource will not be transported.
    * Keep - Amount of resource to keep in the city when transporting the resource.
    * Trade - Minimum amount of resource to transport.
    * Example:
      * X amount of food in the city. 
      * Amount to transport = X - keep.
      * If amount to transport is less than trade then the resource is not transported out.
  # Add route
    Clicking this will save the transport.
